name: Click Bait
description:
Construct 3 Free Edition Challenge is a game development series where I wrap my head around all the challenges related to game creation. Join the adventure, and let's find together how a great game is supposed to be made 😼!

🤖 My Series Playlist - https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLUq8rG7wgFX3pMhSTNCGpesmj82d-8D5-

🎮 Check My Previous Game - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1413670/U27RA_R3Z0NANC3/

🕹️ Try Out My Other Games - https://dumivid.itch.io/


😺 Have a wonderful day and stay 🐾sitive
